text: Ara yena tini sasti dite parena munaphika purusadera o munaphika naridera ebam musarika purusadera o musarika naridera -- yara allah sanbandhe bhranta dharana dharana kare thake. Tadera birud'dhe duskarma ghure asabe, ara allah tadera upare raga karechena ebam tadera dhikkara diyechena, ara tadera jan'ya tini jahannama tairi karechena. Ara kata nikrsta gantabyasthala
